name: Round Washer
description:
Hand knit from 100% Australian cotton, this 7' round washcloth is durable, strong & absorbent, yet very soft. 

This cloth is knit using 2 yarns which makes for a chunckier cloth with a 'verigated' look. 

It is avaliable in a large variety of colours, contact me for more details.

This product is sturdy enough for your kitchen messes, yet soft enough for washing your face. 

Lasting a very long time this cloth is a great earth friendly replacement for paper towels or disposable kitchen cloths. Great for use all over the home.

This cloth is machine washable in all kinds of temperatures...

name: 'Simple' Peasant Dress
description:
These simple light weight peasant style girls dresses are avaliable in size 00 - 4.

They are made of 100% cotton and are my own original design ...

I have a large range of fabric avaliable to choose from, email me to find out more about which colours and patterns I have avaliable...

These dresses are custom made to order so please note that the one in the pic is not the one for sale, your dress will be made especially for your little girl in a fabric that you have chosen from my collection.......

name: 2 Pack of Ridge Washers
description:
Hand knit from 100% Australian cotton, these 7' x 7' ridge washcloths are durable, strong & absorbent, yet very soft. 

They are sturdy enough for your kitchen messes, yet soft enough for washing your face. 

Lasting a very long time these cloths are a great earth friendly replacement for paper towels or disposable kitchen cloths. Great for use all over the home.

These cloths are machine washable in all kinds of temperatures...

Colours Available- Chocolate Brown, Bottle Green, Ruby Red, Snow White, Corn Yellow, Melon Green, Baby Pink, Sky Blue, Oatmeal, Peach and Midnight Blue...

You can email me to discuss colour choices at : : d.downs@bigpond.com

name: Rustic Coasters
description:
These handmade crochet coasters will make the perfect addition to any table...

They come in a pack of 2 and are made from 100% Pure Australian Wool. 

Each coaster is approximately 4" in diameter, large enough for most glasses, mugs or cups. 

If you like these coasters but would prefer a different colour, email me at : : d.downs@bigpond.com and I'm more than happy to work something out...

name: Eyelet/Ridge Washer
description:
Hand knit from 100% Australian cotton, this 7' x 7' eyelet/ridge washcloth is durable, strong & absorbent, yet very soft. 

It comes in a variety of colours. You can email me at : : d.downs@bigpond.com for more info of colour choices...

This product is sturdy enough for your kitchen messes, yet soft enough for washing your face. 

Lasting a very long time this cloth is a great earth friendly replacement for paper towels or disposable kitchen cloths. Great for use all over the home.

This cloth is machine washable in all kinds of temperatures...
